Class RowsSubwindow

java.lang.Object
com.tablr.subwindow.Subwindow
com.tablr.subwindow.RowsSubwindow
public class RowsSubwindow extends Subwindow
Represents a subwindow for managing rows in a table. Provides functionality for editing, adding, and removing rows.

  • Field Summary

    Fields inherited from class com.tablr.subwindow.Subwindow

      public RowsSubwindow(int tableId, int x, int y, SubwindowController parentWindow)
      Constructs a RowsSubwindow instance.
      Parameters:
      tableId - The ID of the table associated with this subwindow.
      x - The x-coordinate of the subwindow.
      y - The y-coordinate of the subwindow.
      parentWindow - The parent subwindow controller.
